text: Drago Pudgar (born 27 September 1949) is a Slovenian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1972 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Yugoslavia Category:Ski jumpers at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:People from the Municipality of Črna na Koroškem
title: Drago Pudgar
